directions: Place the carrots, onion, vegetable broth and cilantro into a large saucepan. Bring to a boil, and cook until the carrots are tender, about 10 minutes. Remove from heat and allow to cool slightly.
Puree the soup until smooth, using a blender or food processor. Reheat before serving if necessary.
ingredients: 4 large carrots, cut into 1 inch pieces
title: Carrot and Coriander Soup II
